pages.text: Fi Ad-Dunya Wa Al-'Akhirati Wa Yas'alunaka `Ani Al-Yatama Qul 'Islahun Lahum Khayrun Wa 'In Tukhalituhum Fa'ikhwanukum Wa Allahu Ya`lamu Al-Mufsida Mina Al-Muslihi Wa Law Sha'a Allahu La'a`natakum 'Inna Allaha `Azizun Hakimun

Wa La Tankihu Al-Mushrikati Hatta Yu'uminna Wa La'amatun Mu'uminatun Khayrun Min Mushrikatin Wa Law 'A`jabatkum Wa La Tunkihu Al-Mushrikina Hatta Yu'uminu Wa La`abdun Mu'uminun Khayrun Min Mushrikin Wa Law 'A`jabakum 'Ula'ika Yad`una 'Ila An-Nari Wa Allahu Yad`u 'Ila Al-Jannati Wa Al-Maghfirati Bi'idhnihi Wa Yubayyinu 'Ayatihi Lilnnasi La`allahum Yatadhakkaruna

Wa Yas'alunaka `Ani Al-Mahiđi Qul Huwa 'Adhaan Fa`tazilu An-Nisa' Fi Al-Mahiđi Wa La Taqrabuhunna Hatta Yathurna Fa'idha Tatahharna Fa'tuhunna Min Haythu 'Amarakumu Allahu 'Inna Allaha Yuhibbu At-Tawwabina Wa Yuhibbu Al-Mutatahhirina
Nisa'uukum Harthun Lakum Fa'tu Harthakum 'Anna Shi'tum Wa Qaddimu Li'nfusikum Wa Attaqu Allaha Wa A`lamu 'Annakum Mulaquhu Wa Bashiri Al-Mu'uminina
Wa La Taj`alu Allaha `Urđatan Li'ymanikum 'An Tabarru Wa Tattaqu Wa Tuslihu Bayna An-Nasi Wa Allahu Sami`un `Alimun
